name: Carl Paolino
bio: Hi! I'm a passionate software engineer with experience in full-stack development, machine learning, and modern web technologies. I love building innovative solutions and working on challenging projects that make a real impact.
lookingFor: Full-time opportunities in software engineering where I can contribute to impactful projects
Remote or hybrid positions with growth opportunities
Collaborative teams working on cutting-edge technology
Opportunities to mentor and learn from experienced engineers
